resources.string: Project Illuminate brings unique, artistic, light-driven sculptures to the city of San Jose. This project focuses on the areas of arts and culture, placemaking, public interaction, and cultural awareness.

This concept uses sculptures of interactive, designable lighting schemes to bring together the community of San Jose. Users are able to use our mobile app to upload predefined light patterns and/or interact through the analog interface. Additionally, the source code will be open source for students and developers to contribute to San Jose\'s art and technology culture.

Project Illuminate creates unique, artistic, light driven sculptures. This project focuses in the areas of arts and culture, education, placemaking, public interaction, and most importantly security. This concept brings sculptures of designable lighting schemes to dim areas. Project Illuminate aims to help to make San Jose a better place to live safely, work in collaboration with public art, and play through fluid interactions, all while holding true to being a technologically advanced civic model. Additionally, the software source code will be open for use by students and developers to contribute to San Jose\'s art and technology culture.
